text.tspan: Scralaxy Team Development Hub | v4.0 | 2019 - 2024
Overview:
Hello! Welcome to Version 4.0 of the Scralaxy Team Development Hub.
This is the largest update to date, rivalling Version 3.0! Whilst I can immediately say Version
4.0 is a massive improvement over 3.0, I think it'd be rude of me to not show appreciation for
that update and everything it did for this project.
Thanks to all team members, supporters, or anyone who has played our games since 2017!
Graphical:
- Most sprites and costumes have been modified in some way.
- I could go into detail about each individual change I made, but that'd take me a while...
- As usual, the logo has been updated. I'm pretty satisfied with how it looks now!
- Multiple parallax backgrounds have been implemented, no more static backgrounds! Credit
to all who made the original assets used in the game-specific backgrounds.
- The back button is now the home button, to more accurately reflect its functionality.
Audio:
- A new option has been added to the radio! Using "Shuffle" or "S" will shuffle all tracks!
- The radio now loops the currently selected songs instead of stopping after playing.
- No new music has been added in this update as we peaked in Version 3.0.
Misc.:
- An in-project changelog has been added. Did you figure that one out before just now?
- The Bug Tracker has been renamed to the Bug Net. Other things have been renamed too.
Internal:
- Multiple sprites have been condensed due to more efficient usage of clones and code.
- General code optimisation. I say this pretty often, but this time I feel it is really true.
Comparing 3.0 to 4.0, it's easy to tell how much old uneccesarry code has been removed and
replaced with new, more efficient systems. The main thing here is the fact that I developed
an entirely new UI system which is so much better than how I did things previously.
Scralaxy Team 2017 - 2024
- Changelog - Use W&S or arrow keys -
